channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Canal Boat Diaries
channel.desc: Life on board a narrowboat with Robbie Cumming. Robbie battles his way through blanket weed on the Shropshire Union Canal and discovers industrial secrets in Audlem, Cheshire.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Rise of the Nazis
channel.desc: At the end of March 1945, Nazi Germany is on the brink of collapse, and with Berlin under daily bombardment, Hitler has permanently retreated to his bunker.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Lost Home Movies of Nazi Germany
channel.desc: Amateur footage that reveals both civilian and military life in WWII Germany. Contains some violence and disturbing scenes.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: The Sky at Night
channel.desc: The team explore one of the newest areas of modern astronomy, the search for exoplanets, the distant worlds that orbit stars beyond our own solar system.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Nicholas Shakespeare Remembers
channel.desc: Mario Vargas Llosa. Nicholas Shakespeare looks back on his film about Peruvian novelist Mario Vargas Llosa.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Mario Vargas Llosa
channel.desc: of the Novelist Who Would Be President. Documentary following novelist Mario Vargas Llosa in his bid to become president of Peru.
